channel.title: No One Can Connect To My Server!?
channel.description:
Alright so here's the situation... I have my server running for 3 days. Everything is going like normal then all of the sudden no one can go on unless their using my Internet/Modem to connect. Everything is set like it was before.
- Port is forwarded to 43594 - The IP is set to the correct no-ip address. - The No-ip is set to the correct IP address hosting the Server. - And Even on other sources and clients I used, still the same problem.
I've tried EVERYTHING I know, I don't know what to turn to. Hopefully someone can help.
[b]If You need more information, please let me know![/b]

item.title: No One Can Connect To My Server!?
item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn
item.description:
@eri0nn wrote:

[quote=“You Phail At Life, post:1, topic:354268”]Alright so here’s the situation…
I have my server running for 3 days. Everything is going like normal then all of the sudden no one can go on unless their using my Internet/Modem to connect. Everything is set like it was before.

  • Port is forwarded to 43594
  • The IP is set to the correct no-ip address.
  • The No-ip is set to the correct IP address hosting the Server.
  • And Even on other sources and clients I used, still the same problem.

I’ve tried EVERYTHING I know, I don’t know what to turn to. Hopefully someone can help.

I had Same Problem but now no cause i am using IP CHANGER . now i dont have any problem i have some in Jagex Scape and In Corruptionx Source cause Character Just Keep Walking U can use AtomicScape For That And EveryBOdy Can Join Enjoy LOL.

If You need more information, please let me know![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: No One Can Connect To My Server!?
item.dc:creator: @You_Phail_At_Life You Phail At Life
item.description:
@You_Phail_At_Life wrote:

[quote=“Owner Undead, post:11, topic:354268”]You Guys Are Doing it all wrong!!!
go to
www.no-ip.com and remake the server with same ihostname but dont change ip address!!!
i repeat do not change ip address just hostname
then go to
192.168.1.1 or whatever u have it as then go to “applications and gaming”
then make sure protocol is tcp and start port is “43594” or what ever you have and end port to “43594” whatever u have
Enable it and make sure you have a name for it then save settings!!!
then have someone logonto your server if u have a diff router then lynksys then try to find start port and end port[/quote]

Did all that, yet STILL no one can connect to it… ONLY people who are using MY router to connect to the internet can.

Read full topic

item.title: No One Can Connect To My Server!?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Undead Owner Undead
item.description:
@Owner_Undead wrote:

You Guys Are Doing it all wrong!!!
go to
www.no-ip.com and remake the server with same ihostname but dont change ip address!!!
i repeat do not change ip address just hostname
then go to
192.168.1.1 or whatever u have it as then go to “applications and gaming”
then make sure protocol is tcp and start port is “43594” or what ever you have and end port to “43594” whatever u have
Enable it and make sure you have a name for it then save settings!!!
then have someone logonto your server if u have a diff router then lynksys then try to find start port and end port
